name: Student Essentials Under $100
description: Everything a student needs to get productive: Logitech K380 Bluetooth keyboard ($30), Razer DeathAdder Essential mouse ($20), Nulaxy laptop stand ($19), and Lamicall phone/tablet stand ($11). Perfect for dorm rooms and study sessions.

name: Budget Streamer Starter Kit
description: Start streaming without breaking the bank: Blue Yeti USB microphone ($100) for broadcast-quality audio, Logitech C920x webcam ($60) for crisp 1080p video, and Neewer 18-inch ring light ($66) for professional lighting.

name: Coder's Productivity Setup
description: Level up your dev workflow: Logitech MX Mechanical Mini keyboard ($130), MX Master 3S mouse ($90), UGREEN USB-C hub ($20), and LG 34-inch ultrawide monitor ($450). Multi-device switching lets you code across machines seamlessly.

name: Maker & Tinkerer Starter Pack
description: Dive into hardware hacking: Raspberry Pi 5 8GB starter kit ($120) for Linux projects, ELEGOO Arduino Uno starter kit ($37) for electronics, TP-Link smart plugs ($23) for IoT experiments, and SanDisk 1TB portable SSD ($80) for backups.

name: Home Office Comfort Upgrade
description: Transform your WFH space: FEZIBO electric standing desk ($190) with built-in drawer for a clean setup, and Sony WH-1000XM5 noise-cancelling headphones ($298) to block out distractions. Ergonomic and focused.

name: Pro Gamer Ultimate Setup
description: Dominate the competition: SteelSeries Apex Pro TKL Gen 3 keyboard, DAREU Sakura Pink gaming mouse, ASUS ROG Swift 32-inch 4K OLED monitor, and Elgato Facecam 4K. Everything a pro gamer needs for precision, performance, and streaming.

name: AI Developer Powerhouse
description: Built for machine learning engineers and data scientists: NVIDIA RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell GPU, Surface Pro 12 Docking Station Hub, and Crucial X9 1TB Portable SSD for unmatched performance and storage.

name: Streamer's Dream Setup
description: Elevate your streams: Hollyland Lark M2 wireless microphone, Elgato Facecam 4K, and EMEET S600 4K webcam. Pro-level audio and video quality for content creators who demand the best.

name: Home Office Productivity Boost
description: Transform your home office: Anwick 55-inch Electric Standing Desk, Surface Pro 12 Docking Station Hub, and OffiGo 63-inch L Shaped Electric Standing Desk for a spacious, organized, and ergonomic workspace.

name: Student Coder Kit
description: Perfect for budding programmers: YIVU Unibody Split Mechanical Keyboard, 7in1 USB C Hub, and BESIGN LSX7 Laptop Stand for a comfortable, portable, and efficient coding setup.
